Question.Subject: How to edit a blog, and add music?
Question.Content: Ive just started a blog, and I'd like to be able to make it my own. How do I do things like add music to my page, or upload a new background for the blog itself? Please and Thanks. Pretend I know nothing and walk me thru it please. I have no idea what Im doing. blogspot.com Does that help any?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
It all depends on the blogging platform you're using. blogger has a plug-in (or a software) that you can just add onto the blog and it will automatically play music after you upload it onto blogger
Wordpress, however, is another story. You'll need to, again, download a plug in that will allow you to put music on the website.
Hope this helps!

Answer.Content:

Wordpress, however, is another story. You'll need to, again, download a plug in that will allow you to put music on the website.
Hope this helps!
